name: Trolley Folly (TrolleyKids)
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys = Move Trolley (tank controls)
Tab = Switch Trolleys 
R = Restart Level
Space = Split Trolley Chain

Control a sentient trolley and collect all the other trolleys in the car park. Once you've rounded them all up, head over to the nearest trolley bay to complete the level!

Made by:
Carla Gonzalez
Jeremy Little
Nima Karimi
Jack Sinclair
